meanings.definition: The act of doing good or helping others.
meanings.sent1: Volunteering at the shelter is a wonderful benefaction to those in need.
meanings.sent2: His daily acts of benefaction towards his neighbors earned him the title of 'community hero'.

meanings.sent4: Her constant benefaction towards her friends was like a beacon of light in their lives.
